carbon.animation

Interface AnimatedView

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppBarLayout, AutoCompleteEditText, AutoCompleteLayout, BottomBar, BottomSheet, Button, CheckBox, CheckedTextView, Chip, CollapsingToolbarLayout, ConstraintLayout, CoordinatorLayout, DrawerLayout, DropDown, EditText, ExpansionPanel, FastLayout, FloatingActionButton, FlowLayout, FrameLayout, GridLayout, ImageView, InputLayout, LinearLayout, MarshmallowEditText, ProgressBar, RadioButton, RadioGroup, RangeSeekBar, RelativeLayout, SearchEditText, SeekBar, Snackbar, TableLayout, TextView, Toolbar

    public interface AnimatedView
    Interface of a view with animations. These animations are used for changing visibility by using setVisible(boolean) method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      android.animation.Animator getAnimator()
      Gets the current Animator object.
      AnimUtils.Style getInAnimation()
      Gets the animation used when view's visibility is changed from GONE/INVISIBLE to VISIBLE
      AnimUtils.Style getOutAnimation()
      Gets the animation used when view's visibility is changed from VISIBLE to GONE/INVISIBLE
      void setInAnimation(AnimUtils.Style inAnim)
      Sets the animation used when view's visibility is changed from GONE/INVISIBLE to VISIBLE
      void setOutAnimation(AnimUtils.Style outAnim)
      Sets the animation used when view's visibility is changed from VISIBLE to GONE/INVISIBLE

    • Method Detail

      • getAnimator

        android.animation.Animator getAnimator()
        Gets the current Animator object. Works like View.getAnimation() but with animators.
        Returns:
        the current Animator object or null

      • getOutAnimation

        AnimUtils.Style getOutAnimation()
        Gets the animation used when view's visibility is changed from VISIBLE to GONE/INVISIBLE
        Returns:
        the current out animation or AnimUtils.Style.None if nothing is set.

      • setOutAnimation

        void setOutAnimation(AnimUtils.Style outAnim)
        Sets the animation used when view's visibility is changed from VISIBLE to GONE/INVISIBLE
        Parameters:
        outAnim - new out animation. Use AnimUtils.Style.None for no animation.

      • getInAnimation

        AnimUtils.Style getInAnimation()
        Gets the animation used when view's visibility is changed from GONE/INVISIBLE to VISIBLE
        Returns:
        the current in animation or AnimUtils.Style.None if nothing is set.

      • setInAnimation

        void setInAnimation(AnimUtils.Style inAnim)
        Sets the animation used when view's visibility is changed from GONE/INVISIBLE to VISIBLE
        Parameters:
        inAnim - new in animation. Use AnimUtils.Style.None for no animation.
